Class CSVExporter¶

class app.impex.CSVExporter(path, entries)[source]¶

Bases: app.impex.Exporter

Export a list of L{Entries<app.entry.Entry>} to a CSV (tabs) file.

__init__(path, entries)[source]¶

@type path: L{str} @param path: The path to a file. @type entries: list of L{app.entry.Entry} @param entries: The list of entries to export.

_exportEntry(entry)[source]¶

Export to CSV (tabs). The first row consists of the field names for each column. @rtype: L{int} @return: The total number of entries successfully exported. @raise Exception: If an error occurred during the export process.

_preprocess()[source]¶
